junctionTemp.description: recommended operating junction temperature range of a part

junctionTempMax.description: absolute maximum junction temperature range of a part

ambientTemp.description: recommended operating ambient air temperature range of a part

ambientTempMax.description: absolute maximum ambient air temperature range under which a part operates

caseTemp.description: case temperature range of a part

caseTempMax.description: absolute maximum case temperature range of a part

leadTempMax.description: absolute maximum lead temperature of a part

storageTempMax.description: absolute maximum storage temperature range of a part

packageThermalResistance.description: package thermal resistance of a part

ThermalResistanceJunctionToAmbient.description: thermal resistance between the semiconductor junction of a part and the ambient air

ThermalResistanceJunctionToCase.description: thermal resistance between the semiconductor junction and the package surface of a part

ThermalResistanceJunctionToboard.description: thermal resistance between the semiconduction junction of a part and the board

ThermalResistanceJunctionToLead.description: thermal resistance between the semiconduction junction of a part and the soldering point

ThermalResistanceCaseToAmbient.description: thermal resistance between the package surface of a part and the ambient air
